string-array.item: Xiaomi\'s CEO Do not like Equated with Apple
SpaceX Ready to Launch 4,425 Broadband Satellites

string-array.name: array_description
string-array.item: Xiaomi is often called an iPhone imitation. However, the Chinese mobile phone CEO, Lei Jun, did not want his company compared to Apple.
In November 2016, the space company led by Elon Musk this Registering 4,425 satellite launch plans to the Federal Communications Commission.
